title: How to Make a Hawaiian Island Surfer Mocktail

steps.headline: Add crushed ice to a wine glass.
Measure and pour the ingredients into the glass.
Use a swizzle stick to gently stir everything together.
Garnish the drink by putting a maraschino cherry on top.
steps.description: You can also insert medium sized chunks of tropical fruit, such as pineapple or an orange wedge.

text: Add crushed ice to a wine glass.  Measure and pour the ingredients into the glass.  Use a swizzle stick to gently stir everything together.  Garnish the drink by putting a maraschino cherry on top. You can also insert medium sized chunks of tropical fruit, such as pineapple or an orange wedge. Serve the drink with straws.
